title: Hacker ruined my account
body:
Somebody stole my account. He feed in rank games and hate talk in games so much.
There was a chat logs showing my speech that I've never typed. I found out my account was perma-banned. please help me solving this problem thank you!

replies.body:
Two answers:

A: you knowingly gave out your password, probably by clicking  a "FREE RP" link and being stupid.

B: you did it and are blaming it on imaginary hackers.

The answer to both things is: next time, dont do that.
No i didnt do it. I was thinking the Riot could check my old match history and IP address somehow.

No one on the Boards can help with things like this.

Send a ticket here and you can get help:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Post a screenshot of the chat logs. Its apparent from your post your english skills are shit. Post the chat logs if we see the same broken english its obvious it was you.
